text: Dear Julia Experts, I want to run a compiled file on a cluster where Julia is not installed. I tried to use the PackageCompiler on my *jl file. I anyone here to guide me through that jungle? My latest error message was ERROR: could not find project at "...". I have no clue how to do it. Thank you!
